analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na parittam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ parittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na appamāṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ appamāṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
